post.body: heh you didn't have to, i was just being extra bitter. <3
i think i fell in love with him when he said "oh Honey" to Kathy Griffin http://twurl.nl/3s4e2p (at around 0:41)
as long as it's not sushi *at* safeway :)
Hmm.. Does it count if you at least class it up and use Orangina? Like, a mimogina? Orangmosa?
yeah i'm trying to retrace and see if i did anything crepy/awkward/unsettling. I thought it went well though.. hmm :-/
haha, but he just got stung by a scorpion! Sympathy, no?
Somehow i'm sure the three gay guys are gonna love you, heh!
sweet! Actually i might have a free room for $950 starting in Feb, if you're into the Inner Richmond http://twurl.nl/64wv3j
Sweet, will you be in the city on any given day, or i can drive down, how long are you here till?
is barfing Star Wars. Anakin is evil, I get it.
is dealing with being single.
Ok maybe it didn't go too well, just got a wicked loser txt from him
First date went well, though I don't think he fully comprehends how awesome I am.
is such a fucking sucker for exclamation mark. Exclamation mark makes any statement more exciting!
Priscilla Ahn makes a great start in 2009. Check her out on iTunes.
is surprised his dad's churchgoing friends wants to add him on facebook! He almost lol'd.
loves the gay jokes made by my dad's churchgoing friends. Loves it.
is being a goid son, having dinner at the parents with their churchgoing friends.
is focusing on his new year resolution and has stopped acting like a mad wicked loser. (Shit, is updating facebook status a loser thing to d
Nothing celebrates the new year like a cloudy day, green tea, Twitter and some Astrud Gilberto.
